channel.title: Bootstrapped product resource list
channel.description:
A great list of products, services and info for bootstrappers but together by @rachelandrew. We receive a few lovely mentions in there as well. Thanks Rachel!
http://rachelandrew.co.uk/archives/2013/12/23/the-bootstrapped-product-resource-list/

item.title: Bootstrapped product resource list
item.dc:creator: anon3850446
item.description:
Great list! Was actually going to write a similar post for my blog – Rachel’s list is way better.

Bootstrapped, Chasing Product & Startup For The Rest Of Us are definitely the cornerstone of my own list. Also, learning about The Blue Ocean Strategy from listening to Ian on Chasing Product was another eye opener. I’m in a Blue Ocean BTW.

Great job Rachel!

Read full topic

item.description:

The Bootstrapped Product Resource List

A list of resources, reading and listening to help kick start your product business in the New Year.
